and.attribute: Please send your CV to huong.nguyen@navigossearch.com

• Support in coordination between platform, transporter to ensure production and maintenance activities (well testing, maintenance activities) are well planned • Analyse and report process plant performance and have them reflected in monthly production review meeting. Report weekly, monthly and annually production data. • Work closely with Production/ Process Engineer across department to provide technical clarifications • Participate in studying and implementing Facility Change Proposal to optimise • Perform simulations using various computational soft wares to deliver engineering studies, production planning/optimization • Verifications of Metering data and report mis-measurement

- Experience: 3 year - University graduation, major in automation or mechatronics - Knowledge of sensor, motor, PLC, .... - High responsibility, eager to learn and good personality. - Understanding of electronics industry and basic production knowledge - Experience in operating test equipment in production line -Able to interact and communicate effectively with all level of employees. Attractive remuneration package including competitive salary, fixed and variable bonus, allowances and excellent working environment will be offered to successful candidate. Activities of the company intend to create a respectful workplace in which every individual has the opportunity to reach his or her highest potential. * Interested parties are invited to forward detailed resume in English by click "APPLY NOW"

and.attribute: Navigos Search is the leading, most experienced and highly qualified executive recruitment firm in Vietnam. Our mission is to help people and companies achieve their dream. We do this by matching talented individuals to the jobs for which they are best suited, ensuring that our clients have the right people on board that they need to succeed, and our candidates land the job of their dream. We accomplish this mission thanks to our strong expertise in local labor market, an established and broad network of clients and candidates and a proven recruitment method of international standards.
